analyzed: sgo nas de rnam par bgro bar byed do //

original: sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung ba'i zhing khams dpal dang ldan pa zhes bya ba rin po che'i phung po rnam par bkod pa na bee d'urya 'od mtho ba zhes bya ba'i ri bo la skyes bu chen po rdo rje rin chen zhes bya bar byang chub sems dpa'

translated: In the buddha realm of the buddha Jewel Source, called Glorious, which is arrayed as a mass of jewels, on the mountain called High Light of Beryl, the great being called Vajra Jewel,

original: bye ba phrag sa ya'i 'khor dang bcas te sems kyi dkyil 'khor 'od gsal ba gsang sngags kyi ngo bo de nyid rang gi ston pa la nyan cing rang gi nyen 'khor la de bzhin ston te yongs su 'das nas kyang ji lta bar bsnyad pa'i sgo nas

translated: together with an entourage of a billion bodhisattvas, listens to the essence of secret mantra, the clear light of the mind, from his teacher and teaches it to his own entourage.

original: de rnam par bgro bar byed do //
analyzed: de rnam par bgro bar byed do //
translated: After they have passed away, they discuss it by means of what they have been told.

translated: In the buddha realm of the buddha Amitābha, called “Endowed with Lotuses,” which is beautifully arrayed with lotuses, on the mountain heap of lotuses, the great being called “Cloud of Dharma” together with an assembly of ten billion bodhisattvas,

original: dkyil 'khor 'od gsal ba gsang sngags kyi ngo bo de nyid rang gi ston pa la nyan cing rang gi nyen 'khor la de bzhin ston te yongs su 'das nas kyang ji lta bar bsnyad pa'i sgo nas de rnam par bgro bar byed do //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor 'od gsal ba gsang sngags kyi ngo bo de nyid rang gi ston pa la nyan cing rang gi nyen 'khor la de bzhin ston te yongs su 'das nas kyang ji lta bar bsnyad pa'i sgo nas de rnam par bgro bar byed do //
translated: listens to the essence of secret mantra, the clear light of the mind, from his teacher and teaches it to his own retinue. After they have passed away, they discuss it by means of the explanations they have received.

analyzed: sangs rgyas gdon mi za bar grub pa'i zhing khams @124b rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba aindra n'i la'i dra bas brgyan pa na rin po che sna tshogs bkod pa'i spo zhes bya ba'i ri bo la skyes bu chen po rdo rje las zhes bya bar byang
translated: In the buddha realm of the buddha Aśvaghoṣa, called “Pure,” which is arrayed with nets of sapphire, on the mountain called “Array of Various Jewels,” the great being called “Vajra Action,” together with an assembly of ten billion bodhisattvas,

original: chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag sa ya'i 'khor dang bcas te sems kyi dkyil 'khor 'od gsal ba gsang sngags kyi ngo bo de nyid rang gi ston pal nyan cing rang gi nyen 'khor la de bzhin ston te yongs su 'das nas kyang ma nor bar btags pa'i

translated: He is surrounded by a retinue of a billion bodhisattvas, and he teaches them the essence of secret mantra, the clear light of the mind, to his own teacher, and they in turn teach it to their own retinues.

original: sgo nas de rnam par bgro bar byed do //
analyzed: sgo nas de rnam par bgro bar byed do //
translated: After they have passed away, they discuss it among themselves by means of unerring designations.

original: sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad kyi zhing khams byang chub kyi snying po can zhes bya bar sems sna tshogs kyis bstan pa na chos kyis mtho ba zhes bya ba'i ra ba la skyes bu chen po rdo rje 'dzin pa zhes bya bar byang chub sems dpa' bye

translated: In the buddha realm of Vairocana, called the “Heart of Awakening,” when the teaching of the various minds was being given, in a park called “Elevated by Dharma,” there was a great being called “Vajra Holder.” He was a bodhisattva who had attained the tenth bhumi.

original: ba phrag sa ya'i 'khor dang bcas te sems kyi rang bzhin 'od gsal ba gsang sngags kyi ngo bo de nyid rang gi ston pa la nyan cing rang gi nyen 'khor la de bzhin ston te yongs su 'das kyang de kho na nyid du nges pa'i sgo nas

translated: Together with an entourage of a billion yakṣas, he listened to the nature of mind, the essence of secret mantra, from his teacher and taught it to his own retinue.

original: de rnam par bgro bar byed do //
analyzed: de rnam par bgro bar byed do //

analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /

analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /

analyzed: dga' zhing mgu ba dang / rangs par 'gyur ba'i phyir sna tshogs su snang ba'o //

original: kye lang ka'i bdag po /
analyzed: kye lang ka'i bdag po /

analyzed: ma 'das pa'ang yod do zhes smras pas lus kyi sems dpa' de yid yongs su rangs par 'gyur ro //

analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las /

analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i cho 'phrul yongs su bkod pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o;; ;;de nas lang ka'i bdag pos dris pa /

analyzed: gsang ba pa'i bdag po /

analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes dngos gang la bgyi /

original: gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa /
analyzed: gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa /

original: lang ka'i bdag po /
analyzed: lang ka'i bdag po /

analyzed: lang ka'i bdag pos dris pa /

analyzed: kye gsang ba pa'i bdag po /

analyzed: sems kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bgyi ba ni gang /

analyzed: de bzhin du 'od gsal ba zhes bya ba dang / gsang sngags kyi ngo bo zhes bya ba @146a *//
translated: Likewise, what is meant by luminous, the essence of the secret mantra,

analyzed: ba dang / ji bzhin pa'i de bzhin pa de kho na nyid ces gang la bgyi /

analyzed: gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa /
translated: The Lord of the Secret Ones replies:

original: lang ka'i bdag po /
analyzed: lang ka'i bdag po /

analyzed: sems zhes bya ba ni ma byas ma bcos sna tshogs su 'byung ba'o //

analyzed: dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba ni thig le gang yin pa nyid do //
translated: The so-called mandala is the very essence of the bindu.

original: 'od ces bya ba ni snang ba'o //
analyzed: 'od ces bya ba ni snang ba'o //

analyzed: gsang ba zhes bya ba ni smrar byed pa spyod yul du ma gyur pa la bya'o //

analyzed: sngags zhes bya ba ni yon tan gyi 'byung gnas su brjod pa la bya'o //

original: gsang ba pa'i bdag po /
analyzed: gsang ba pa'i bdag po /

original: ma byas ma bcos pa zhes bya ba ni gang /
analyzed: ma byas ma bcos pa zhes bya ba ni gang /
translated: What is meant by ‘unmade and unfabricated’?

original: sna tshogs 'byung ba zhes bya ba ni ji lta bu /
analyzed: sna tshogs 'byung ba zhes bya ba ni ji lta bu /

original: gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa /
analyzed: gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa /
translated: ” The master of the secret teaching replied:

original: lang ka'i bdag po; byed pa po med la bya bas btsal du med pa'i phyir ma byas pa'o //
analyzed: lang ka'i bdag po; byed pa po med la bya bas btsal du med pa'i phyir ma byas pa'o //
translated: “O lord of Laṅkā! It is unmade because there is no maker and no action to be sought.

original: gzhi ji bzhin pa'i phyir ma bcos pa'o //
analyzed: gzhi ji bzhin pa'i phyir ma bcos pa'o //
translated: It is unfabricated because it is just as it is.

original: gang med pa las rgyun du 'byung zhing yul tha dad @146b la 'gro ba legs pa dang / nyes pa dang / gnyi ga ma yin pa sna tshogs 'byung ba ste gang de nyid ni nam mkha' lta bu'o //

original: de rgyun ni 'byung ba ste /
analyzed: de rgyun ni 'byung ba ste /

analyzed: sprin dang / khug rlangs dang / 'ja' rlan la sogs pa lta bu'o //
translated: It is like clouds, fog, rainbows, and so on.

original: yang dris pa /
analyzed: yang dris pa /

original: gsang ba pa'i bdag po /
analyzed: gsang ba pa'i bdag po /
translated: “Lord of the Secret Ones,🔽why is it called Vajrasattva?”

original: de la ci'i phyir rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bgyi /
analyzed: de la ci'i phyir rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bgyi /
translated: Vajrapāṇi replied:

original: smras pa / lang ka'i bdag po /
analyzed: smras pa / lang ka'i bdag po /
translated: “Lord of Laṇkā,

analyzed: de kho na nyid ji bzhin pa de ni thams cad nas thams cad du gnyen po med pa /

original: 'pho 'gyur med pa /
analyzed: 'pho 'gyur med pa /
translated: It is without transition or change.

original: skye 'gags med pa /
analyzed: skye 'gags med pa /
translated: It is without arising or cessation.

original: de kho na nyid sems rang rig pa /
analyzed: de kho na nyid sems rang rig pa /

translated: In the Sūtra Unraveling the Intention, it is called Vajrasattva because it destroys the various magical creations as being nonexistent.”

original: lang ka'i bdag po /
analyzed: lang ka'i bdag po /

analyzed: de la ni bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi sems zhes kyang bya'o //

original: mtha' las 'das pa zhes kyang bya'o //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa zhes kyang bya'o //

original: dbu mar mi dmigs pa zhes kyang bya'o //

analyzed: sprul pa kun gyi 'byung gnas zhes kyang bya'o //
translated: It is also called the source of all emanations.🔽It is also called the spiritual friend of all buddhas.

translated: because all phenomena are naturally present in emptiness, great compassion is the absence of an object of compassion, because it is not seen as dual. It is great compassion because it liberates all the cores of the hearts of all sentient beings into awakening.

original: lang ka'i bdag po /
analyzed: lang ka'i bdag po /

analyzed: ji ltar byung de skad ces dris pa las / gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa /

analyzed: kye lang ka'i bdag po /

analyzed: gsang sngags kyi ngo bo nyid rdo rje sems dpa' de ni 'khor ba dang bcas mya ngan las 'das pa gnyis kyi khams nas byung ngo //

analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs dang / sems can kun gyi sems la gnas so //

analyzed: ye ji bzhin pa dang / rgyud dag par rang byung ngo //
translated: It is the primordial nature just as it is, and it is self-arisen in the pure continuum.

original: yang lang ka'i bdag pos dris pa /
analyzed: yang lang ka'i bdag pos dris pa /

original: gsang ba pa'i bdag po /
analyzed: gsang ba pa'i bdag po /

analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du nges pa gang la gzhag par bgyi /

original: gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa /
analyzed: gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa /
translated: The Lord of Secrets said:

original: lang ka'i bdag po /
analyzed: lang ka'i bdag po /
translated: Master of Lanka,

original: rdo rje sems dpa' ni gcig dang / tha dad pa'i ngo bo nyid las grol te chos rnams kyi chos nyid ma bcos ma bslad pa /
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' ni gcig dang / tha dad pa'i ngo bo nyid las grol te chos rnams kyi chos nyid ma bcos ma bslad pa /
translated: Vajrasattva is free from the nature of being one or different. It is the unfabricated and unadulterated dharmata of phenomena.

original: snying po byang chub tu ye nas gnas pa de la ye ji bzhin pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' zhes gdags so //
analyzed: snying po byang chub tu ye nas gnas pa de la ye ji bzhin pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' zhes gdags so //
translated: It is the primordial nature just as it is, and it is called the primordial Vajrasattva.

original: sems can kun gyi sems kyi chos nyid gang mthong ba'i gnas skabs la ni rgyud dag pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' zhes gdags so //🔽de bzhin du sangs rgyas thams cad kyang ye ji @150a *//

analyzed: bzhin pa dang / rgyud dag pa'i sangs rgyas su rnam par snang ngo //

original: de skad ces dris pa las /
analyzed: de skad ces dris pa las /

analyzed: gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa /

analyzed: chos can yang med la chos can du gdags pa'ang med do //

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is this?

original: chos thams cad ni byang chub kyi mtshan nyid yin la byang chub ni nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de /
analyzed: chos thams cad ni byang chub kyi mtshan nyid yin la byang chub ni nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de /
translated: All phenomena have the defining characteristic of awakening, and awakening has the defining characteristic of space.

original: nam mkha' ni mtshan nyid thams cad bral ba'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' ni mtshan nyid thams cad bral ba'o //
translated: Space is free from all defining characteristics.

original: de'i phyir byang chub ni sems las btsal bar bya'o //🔽sems de ni rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa'i phyir nang na'ang med /
analyzed: de'i phyir byang chub ni sems las btsal bar bya'o // sems de ni rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa'i phyir nang na'ang med /
translated: Therefore, awakening should be sought in the mind.🔽That mind does not exist internally,

original: phyi rol na'ang med /🔽@150b gnyi gar yang mi dmigs so //🔽sems de ni sangs rgyas kyis kyang ma gzigs /
analyzed: phyi rol na'ang med / @150b gnyi gar yang mi dmigs so // sems de ni sangs rgyas kyis kyang ma gzigs /
translated: externally, or in both, because it is pure by nature.

original: mi gzigs / gzigs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mi gzigs / gzigs par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: That mind has not been seen, is not being seen, and will not be seen by the buddhas.

original: de ji ltar ma gzigs na kha dog tu ma gzigs so; ;dbyibs su ma gzigs so //
analyzed: de ji ltar ma gzigs na kha dog tu ma gzigs so; ;dbyibs su ma gzigs so //
translated: How is it not seen? It is not seen as color. It is not seen as shape.

original: mun par ma gzigs so //
analyzed: mun par ma gzigs so //
translated: It is not seen as darkness.

original: snang bar ma gzigs so //
analyzed: snang bar ma gzigs so //
translated: It is not seen as light.

original: pho mor ma gzigs so //
analyzed: pho mor ma gzigs so //
translated: It is not seen as male or female.

original: ma ning du ma gzigs so //
analyzed: ma ning du ma gzigs so //
translated: It is not seen as neuter.

original: khams gsum gyi rang bzhin du ma gzigs so //
analyzed: khams gsum gyi rang bzhin du ma gzigs so //
translated: It is not seen as the nature of the three realms.

original: lha'i sems su ma gzigs so //
analyzed: lha'i sems su ma gzigs so //
translated: It is not seen as the mind of a god.

original: klu'i sems su ma gzigs so //
analyzed: klu'i sems su ma gzigs so //
translated: It is not seen as the mind of a nāga.

original: de bzhin du gnod sbyin gyi sems dang / dri za'i sems dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa dang / byol song dang / yi dvags dang /
analyzed: de bzhin du gnod sbyin gyi sems dang / dri za'i sems dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa dang / byol song dang / yi dvags dang /
translated: Similarly, it is not seen as the mind of a yakṣa, a gandharva, an asura, a garuḍa, a kinnara, a mahoraga, a human, a non-human, an animal, a hungry ghost,

original: dmyal ba la sogs pa 'gro ba ris tha dad pa'i sems su ma gzigs so //
analyzed: dmyal ba la sogs pa 'gro ba ris tha dad pa'i sems su ma gzigs so //
translated: or a hell being, and so on. It is not seen as the mind of the different types of beings.

original: rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba'o //
translated: It is free from all thoughts and concepts.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: sems kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni rdo rje sems dpa'i rang 'byung gi ye shes yin la /
analyzed: sems kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni rdo rje sems dpa'i rang 'byung gi ye shes yin la /
translated: The nature of mind is the self-arisen wisdom of Vajrasattva.

original: ye shes de ni nam mkha'i rang bzhin te rang bzhin med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ye shes de ni nam mkha'i rang bzhin te rang bzhin med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: That wisdom is of the nature of space, because it is essenceless.

original: yang lang ka'i bdag pos dris pa /
analyzed: yang lang ka'i bdag pos dris pa /
translated: Again, the lord of Lanka asked:

original: kye gsang ba pa'i bdag po /
analyzed: kye gsang ba pa'i bdag po /
translated: Oh Lord of Secrets,

original: sems can gyi sems de ci'i phyir rdo rje sems dpa'i rang 'byung gi ye shes yin /
analyzed: sems can gyi sems de ci'i phyir rdo rje sems dpa'i rang 'byung gi ye shes yin /
translated: why is the mind of sentient beings the self-arisen wisdom of Vajrasattva?

original: gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa /
analyzed: gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa /
translated: The Lord of Secrets said:

original: lang ka'i bdag po /
analyzed: lang ka'i bdag po /
translated: Lord of Lanka,

original: sems can gyi de @151a *//
analyzed: sems can gyi de @151a *//
translated: the suchness of sentient beings

original: bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rdo rje sems dpa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa 'di la gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rdo rje sems dpa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa 'di la gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do //
translated: and the suchness of Vajrasattva are non-dual and indivisible.

original: de ji lta zhe na /
analyzed: de ji lta zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

original: gang chags pa'i sems kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni rdo rje sems dpa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: gang chags pa'i sems kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni rdo rje sems dpa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The suchness of the mind of attachment is the suchness of Vajrasattva.

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de kho na nyid do //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de kho na nyid do //
translated: The suchness of Vajrasattva is thatness.

original: gang chags pa med pa'i sems kyi de bzhin nyid ni rdo rje sems dpa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: gang chags pa med pa'i sems kyi de bzhin nyid ni rdo rje sems dpa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The suchness of the mind of non-attachment is the suchness of Vajrasattva.

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i de bzhin nyid ni de kho na nyid do //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i de bzhin nyid ni de kho na nyid do //
translated: The suchness of Vajrasattva is thatness.

original: gang zhe sdang gi sems kyi de kho na nyid ni rdo rje sems dpa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: gang zhe sdang gi sems kyi de kho na nyid ni rdo rje sems dpa'i de bzhin nyid do //

analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i de bzhin nyid ni de kho na nyid do //
translated: The suchness of Vajrasattva is thatness.

analyzed: gang byams pa'i sems kyi de bzhin nyid ni rdo rje sems dpa'i de bzhin nyid do //

analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i de bzhin ni de kho na nyid do //

translated: The suchness of Vajrasattva is thatness.

analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa lar na gsang ba pa'i bdag po ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rdo rje sems dpa'i gsang ba dam pa ma nor ba de kho na nyid the tshom thams cad gcod pa lags na
translated: All the bhagavān buddhas said, Well then, Guhyapati, since the lord of the secret ones is the lord of all tathāgatas, the secret of Vajrasattva, the ultimate, unerring suchness, which cuts through all doubts,

analyzed: gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa; kye; dman pa'i lus kyi sems dpa' rnams /

original: de ji lta zhe na /
analyzed: de ji lta zhe na /

translated: As long as the buddhas who appear in the pure realms and the buddhas who appear in the impure realms do not attain certainty in thatness, they practice austerities.

analyzed: ngan drug cu 'byung ngo //

analyzed: de sngon du bskal pa rdzogs ldan zhes bya ba la sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgya byung ngo //

analyzed: skyes bu dam pa rdo rje sna tshogs zhes bya ba de ni 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dag pa zhes bya bar sangs rgyas gdon mi za bar grub pa @168b zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The holy being called Vajraviśva will appear in the world system called Viśuddhi as the Buddha called Amoghasiddhi.

original: zhing khams de dag kun gyi yon tan ni yongs su brjod par bya ba'i dpe las 'das te dpe med pa'i phyir brjod kyis mi lang ngo //
analyzed: zhing khams de dag kun gyi yon tan ni yongs su brjod par bya ba'i dpe las 'das te dpe med pa'i phyir brjod kyis mi lang ngo //
translated: The qualities of all those world systems are beyond description, beyond analogy, and therefore inexpressible.

original: sku tshe'i tshad ni dpag tu med pa 'ba' zhig go /
analyzed: sku tshe'i tshad ni dpag tu med pa 'ba' zhig go /
translated: Their lifespans are immeasurable.

original: zhing khams der 'khod pa'i sems can chen po rnams ni rig 'dzin chen po 'ba' zhig go /
analyzed: zhing khams der 'khod pa'i sems can chen po rnams ni rig 'dzin chen po 'ba' zhig go /
translated: The great beings who dwell in those world systems are only great awareness holders.

original: tshe tshad kyang de nyid kyi rig pa 'dzin pa'i tshe tshad nyid do //
analyzed: tshe tshad kyang de nyid kyi rig pa 'dzin pa'i tshe tshad nyid do //
translated: Their lifespans are the lifespans of awareness holders.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan nas smin pa'i rig 'dzin mtha' thug pa med pa rnams kyang zhing khams de dag tu rnam par snang ngo //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan nas smin pa'i rig 'dzin mtha' thug pa med pa rnams kyang zhing khams de dag tu rnam par snang ngo //
translated: Also, the limitless vidyadharas who have matured in other worldly realms appear in those pure realms.

original: de dag na chos nyan pa dang / smra ba dang / rnam bar 'gro ba ni ting nge 'dzin 'ba' zhig go /
analyzed: de dag na chos nyan pa dang / smra ba dang / rnam bar 'gro ba ni ting nge 'dzin 'ba' zhig go /
translated: In those realms, listening to dharma, speaking dharma, and moving about are only done in samadhi.

original: chos kyang bya ba med pa'i chos nyid de kho na nyid gsang ba dam pa 'ba' zhig go /
analyzed: chos kyang bya ba med pa'i chos nyid de kho na nyid gsang ba dam pa 'ba' zhig go /
translated: The dharma is only the secret, sublime suchness of dharmata that is free from activity.

original: longs spyod kyang chos nyid zab mo 'ba' zhig la longs spyod do //
analyzed: longs spyod kyang chos nyid zab mo 'ba' zhig la longs spyod do //
translated: Enjoyment is only the enjoyment of profound dharmata.

original: rig 'dzin de dag kun kyang rigs lnga 'ba' zhig ste /
analyzed: rig 'dzin de dag kun kyang rigs lnga 'ba' zhig ste /
translated: All of those vidyadharas are only the five families.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: thams cad kyang rigs lnga las byung zhing lngar snang la lngar smin pa ste /
analyzed: thams cad kyang rigs lnga las byung zhing lngar snang la lngar smin pa ste /
translated: All of them arise from the five families, appear as the five, and mature as the five.

original: lnga las gyur bas lngar nges pa ni /
analyzed: lnga las gyur bas lngar nges pa ni /
translated: Since they arise from the five, they are ascertained as the five.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: They are as follows.

original: gang zhe sdang gi rigs dang / nga rgyal gyi rigs dang / 'dod chags kyi rigs dang / phrag dog gi rigs dang / gti mug gi rigs dang / bzod ldan gyi rigs dang / kun gdung gi rigs dang / drug 'byung gi rigs dang /
analyzed: gang zhe sdang gi rigs dang / nga rgyal gyi rigs dang / 'dod chags kyi rigs dang / phrag dog gi rigs dang / gti mug gi rigs dang / bzod ldan gyi rigs dang / kun gdung gi rigs dang / drug 'byung gi rigs dang /
translated: the family of anger, the family of pride, the family of desire, the family of jealousy, the family of ignorance, the family of patience, the family of universal torment, the family of the six arising,

original: rgyud ldan gyi rigs dang / gnas ldan gyi rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / bram ze'i zigs dang / gdol @169a *//
analyzed: rgyud ldan gyi rigs dang / gnas ldan gyi rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / bram ze'i zigs dang / gdol @169a *//
translated: the family of the lineage holder, the family of the resident, the family of the śūdra, the family of the kṣatriya, the family of the vaiśya, the family of the brahmin, the family of the untouchable,

original: ba'i rigs dang / kun snang gi rigs dang / rigs gcig pa'i rigs dang / tha dad pa'i rigs dang / bya ba byed pa'i rigs dang / thams cad 'byung ba'i rigs dang / rdo rje'i gdung dang / sde'i rigs dang / nor bu'i gdung dang /
analyzed: ba'i rigs dang / kun snang gi rigs dang / rigs gcig pa'i rigs dang / tha dad pa'i rigs dang / bya ba byed pa'i rigs dang / thams cad 'byung ba'i rigs dang / rdo rje'i gdung dang / sde'i rigs dang / nor bu'i gdung dang /
translated: the family of universal appearance, the family of the single type, the family of the different, the family of the functioning of action, the family of the arising of all, the vajra family, the family of the clan, the family of the jewel,

original: sde'i rigs dang / padma'i gdung dang / sde'i rigs dang / gzhon nu'i gdung dang / sde'i rigs dang / glang po'i gdung dang / sde'i rigs 'ba' zhig go /
analyzed: sde'i rigs dang / padma'i gdung dang / sde'i rigs dang / gzhon nu'i gdung dang / sde'i rigs dang / glang po'i gdung dang / sde'i rigs 'ba' zhig go /
translated: the family of the clan, the family of the lotus, the family of the clan, the family of the youth, the family of the clan, the family of the elephant, and the family of the clan alone.

original: de bzhin du thams cad nas thams cad du snang ba'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' mtha' thug pa med pa rnams kyang las dang / 'jug pa'i dbang gi rigs lnga 'ba' zhig go /
analyzed: de bzhin du thams cad nas thams cad du snang ba'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' mtha' thug pa med pa rnams kyang las dang / 'jug pa'i dbang gi rigs lnga 'ba' zhig go /
translated: In the same way, all the infinite buddhas and bodhisattvas, in every respect, are only the five families by the power of karma and engagement.

original: ji bzhin pa'i dbang gis nas thams cad nas thams cad du rigs kyi mtshan ma med do //🔽tha snyad mad do; ;rnam pa med do //
analyzed: ji bzhin pa'i dbang gis nas thams cad nas thams cad du rigs kyi mtshan ma med do // tha snyad mad do; ;rnam pa med do //
translated: By the power of the way things are, in every respect, there are no signs of families.🔽There are no conventions.🔽There are no aspects.

original: yul med do //
analyzed: yul med do //
translated: There are no objects.

original: 'jug pa med do //
analyzed: 'jug pa med do //
translated: There is no engagement.

original: sangs rgyas pa med do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas pa med do //
translated: There is no buddhahood.

original: lung bstan pa med do //
analyzed: lung bstan pa med do //
translated: There are no prophecies.

original: nges pa rnyed pa med do //
analyzed: nges pa rnyed pa med do //
translated: There is no attainment of certainty.

original: thams cad nas thams cad du byang chub nyid do; ;stong ba nyid do //
analyzed: thams cad nas thams cad du byang chub nyid do; ;stong ba nyid do //
translated: In every respect, it is enlightenment itself, emptiness,

original: snying po nyid do //
analyzed: snying po nyid do //
translated: the essence,

original: de kho na nyid do //
analyzed: de kho na nyid do //
translated: suchness,

original: yang dag pa nyid do //
analyzed: yang dag pa nyid do //
translated: and reality.

original: nges pa dam pa nyid do //
analyzed: nges pa dam pa nyid do //
translated: It is the highest certainty.

original: gzhan ma yin pa nyid do //
analyzed: gzhan ma yin pa nyid do //
translated: It is non-otherness.

original: skye ba med pa nyid do //
analyzed: skye ba med pa nyid do //
translated: It is non-arising.🔽It is unceasing.

original: 'gag pa med pa nyid do; ;de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: 'gag pa med pa nyid do; ;de bzhin nyid do //
translated: It is thusness.

original: ma nor ba nyid do //🔽chos nyid do //
analyzed: ma nor ba nyid do // chos nyid do //
translated: It is non-erroneousness.🔽It is the nature of phenomena.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid do //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid do //
translated: It is the expanse of reality.

original: bsam gyis mi khyab pas bsam du med pa nyid do //
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab pas bsam du med pa nyid do //
translated: It is inconceivable, and so is beyond conception.🔽It is the sameness of the limit of reality.

original: yang dag pa'i mtha' mnyam pa nyid @169b do zhes lung bstan pa dang / de kho na nyid gsang ba dam pa'i sgra dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i de kho na nyid stong pa nyid las grags pas skyes bu dam pa rnams thams cad nas thams cad du byang chub kyi snying po nyid du nges pa rnyed do //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha' mnyam pa nyid @169b do zhes lung bstan pa dang / de kho na nyid gsang ba dam pa'i sgra dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i de kho na nyid stong pa nyid las grags pas skyes bu dam pa rnams thams cad nas thams cad du byang chub kyi snying po nyid du nges pa rnyed do //
translated: The sound of the secret of thatness, the glorious suchness of Vajrasattva, resounds from emptiness, and all holy beings attain the certainty of the essence of enlightenment.

original: kye lang ka'i bdag po /
analyzed: kye lang ka'i bdag po /
translated: O Lord of Lanka,🔽that secret of the suchness of bodhicitta is like this:

original: byang chub kyi sems de kho na nyid gsang ba dam pa de 'di ltar dka' ba /🔽'di ltar zab ba /
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems de kho na nyid gsang ba dam pa de 'di ltar dka' ba / 'di ltar zab ba /
translated: it is difficult,🔽it is profound,

original: 'di ltar rgya che ba /
analyzed: 'di ltar rgya che ba /
translated: it is vast,

original: 'di ltar bsam du med pa /
analyzed: 'di ltar bsam du med pa /
translated: it is inconceivable,

original: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir gang gi nges pa rnyed par dka' ba na de lta bu'o //
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir gang gi nges pa rnyed par dka' ba na de lta bu'o //
translated: Because it is inconceivable, it is difficult to find certainty in it.

original: de nas yang lang ka'i bdag pos dris pa /
analyzed: de nas yang lang ka'i bdag pos dris pa /
translated: Then again, the ruler of Lanka asked:

original: kye gsang ba ba'i bdag po /
analyzed: kye gsang ba ba'i bdag po /
translated: Oh Lord of Secrets,

original: byang chub kyi sems de kho na nyid gsang ba dam pa /
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems de kho na nyid gsang ba dam pa /
translated: this secret of the thatness of the mind of enlightenment

original: 'di rgyun dang bcas ba zhig gam /🔽'on te rgyun chad pa zhig /
analyzed: 'di rgyun dang bcas ba zhig gam / 'on te rgyun chad pa zhig /
translated: is it continuous or discontinuous?

original: gal te rgyun dang bcas pa zhig na ni ye shes chen po skye 'gag dang bcas pa yin no //
analyzed: gal te rgyun dang bcas pa zhig na ni ye shes chen po skye 'gag dang bcas pa yin no //
translated: If it is continuous, then great wisdom would have arising and ceasing.🔽If it is discontinuous, then wisdom, the distinctions of wisdom,

original: 'on te rgyun chad pa zhig na ni ye shes ye shes kyi khyad par dang / dgongs pa dgongs pa'i go 'phang med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'on te rgyun chad pa zhig na ni ye shes ye shes kyi khyad par dang / dgongs pa dgongs pa'i go 'phang med par 'gyur ro //
translated: and the levels of realization would not exist.

original: de skad ces dris pa dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa /
analyzed: de skad ces dris pa dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa /
translated: When this was asked, the Lord of Secrets said:

original: kye lang ka'i bdag po /
analyzed: kye lang ka'i bdag po /
translated: Oh ruler of Lanka,

original: byang chub kyi sems de kho na nyid gsang ba dam pa de ni skye 'gag med par rgyun dang bcas ba'o //
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems de kho na nyid gsang ba dam pa de ni skye 'gag med par rgyun dang bcas ba'o //
translated: that secret of the thatness of the mind of enlightenment is continuous without arising or ceasing.

original: dris pa / gsang ba ba'i bdag po gang gi rgyun dang bcas pa lags /
analyzed: dris pa / gsang ba ba'i bdag po gang gi rgyun dang bcas pa lags /
translated: It was asked, Lord of Secrets, what is it that has continuity?

original: smras pa / lang ka'i bdag po /
analyzed: smras pa / lang ka'i bdag po /
translated: It was said, Lord of Lanka,

original: ye shes rgyun dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: ye shes rgyun dang bcas pa'o //
translated: it is the continuity of pristine consciousness.

original: snying rje rgyun dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: snying rje rgyun dang bcas pa'o //
translated: It is the continuity of compassion.

original: 'phrin las rgyun dang bcas pa'o //🔽@170a *// yon tan rgyun dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: 'phrin las rgyun dang bcas pa'o // @170a *// yon tan rgyun dang bcas pa'o //
translated: It is the continuity of activity.🔽It is the continuity of qualities.

original: byin brlabs rgyun dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: byin brlabs rgyun dang bcas pa'o //
translated: It is the continuity of blessings.

original: smon lam rgyun dang bcas pa'i phyir rgyun ma chad pa'o //
analyzed: smon lam rgyun dang bcas pa'i phyir rgyun ma chad pa'o //
translated: It is uninterrupted because of the continuity of aspiration.

original: dris pa / gsang ba ba'i bdag po; de dag la ci'i phyir rgyun zhes bya /
analyzed: dris pa / gsang ba ba'i bdag po; de dag la ci'i phyir rgyun zhes bya /
translated: It was asked, Lord of Secrets, why are they called 'continuities'?

original: smras pa / lang ka'i bdag po /
analyzed: smras pa / lang ka'i bdag po /
translated: It was said, Lord of Lanka,

original: rgyun gyi rang bzhin du 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyun gyi rang bzhin du 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because they arise as the nature of continuity.

original: dris pa / rgyun gyi rang bzhin gang /
analyzed: dris pa / rgyun gyi rang bzhin gang /
translated: It was asked, What is the nature of continuity?

original: smras pa / lang ka'i bdag po /
analyzed: smras pa / lang ka'i bdag po /
translated: It was said, Lord of Lanka,

original: gang med pa nyid rgyun gyi rang bzhin te /
analyzed: gang med pa nyid rgyun gyi rang bzhin te /
translated: nonexistence is the nature of continuity.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

original: rgyun dang bcas pa'i byang chub sems /
analyzed: rgyun dang bcas pa'i byang chub sems /
translated: The bodhicitta with continuity

original: med rgyu btags chags bltas par snang //
analyzed: med rgyu btags chags bltas par snang //
translated: appears as the view of attachment to imputation.

original: snang 'dod sdug bsngal chen po'i nad //
analyzed: snang 'dod sdug bsngal chen po'i nad //
translated: The desire to perceive is the illness of great suffering.

original: de nyid che yon rgyun mi 'chad //
analyzed: de nyid che yon rgyun mi 'chad //
translated: That itself is the uninterrupted cause of great qualities.

original: kun tu rgyun dang bcas pa yi //🔽gsang ba dam pa de kho na //
analyzed: kun tu rgyun dang bcas pa yi // gsang ba dam pa de kho na //
translated: It is completely associated with a continuum.🔽That is the secret, the sacred, the very reality.

original: sgron ma dam pa gang dag gis //
analyzed: sgron ma dam pa gang dag gis //
translated: It is the sacred lamp

original: skyes bu dam pa gang dag la //
analyzed: skyes bu dam pa gang dag la //
translated: For those who are sacred beings.

original: de nyid chen por de nyid rgyud //
analyzed: de nyid chen por de nyid rgyud //
translated: That very reality is the continuum of the great.

original: dgongs pa snang ba ma gtogs pa //
analyzed: dgongs pa snang ba ma gtogs pa //
translated: Except for the appearance of the transcendent state,

original: brjod pas bstan yod ma yin te //
analyzed: brjod pas bstan yod ma yin te //
translated: It is not revealed by expression.

original: med rgyu snang med gang mthong ba //
analyzed: med rgyu snang med gang mthong ba //
translated: The cause of nonexistence is not seen in nonappearance.

original: ye gtad ma bcos ji bzhin te //
analyzed: ye gtad ma bcos ji bzhin te //
translated: The primordial entrustment is uncontrived, just as it is.

original: de nyid nges pa de kho na //
analyzed: de nyid nges pa de kho na //
translated: That itself is the ascertained reality.

original: cir yang mi snang dpyod dang bral //
analyzed: cir yang mi snang dpyod dang bral //
translated: It does not appear as anything; it is free from analysis.

original: bsam med yul las 'das pa'o //
analyzed: bsam med yul las 'das pa'o //
translated: It is inconceivable and beyond objects.

original: kye lang ka'i bdag po /
analyzed: kye lang ka'i bdag po /
translated: O master of Lanka,

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi dam pa gsang ba'i snying po 'di la thams cad nas thams cad du gnas par bya'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi dam pa gsang ba'i snying po 'di la thams cad nas thams cad du gnas par bya'o //
translated: this secret essence, the sacredness of all buddhas, should be present everywhere.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: gang las kyi chos kyis bsgyings pa rnams kyis bye ba snyed kyi bskal bar las dka' ba dpag tu med pas 'bad btsal kyang dam pa @170b ma thob pa gang dag gis bya ba med pa'i don gyis thang cig yud tsam pa gsang ba 'di la mos ba
analyzed: gang las kyi chos kyis bsgyings pa rnams kyis bye ba snyed kyi bskal bar las dka' ba dpag tu med pas 'bad btsal kyang dam pa @170b ma thob pa gang dag gis bya ba med pa'i don gyis thang cig yud tsam pa gsang ba 'di la mos ba
translated: Those who are proud of their religious activities, even though they strive for many eons with immeasurable difficult deeds, do not attain the sublime. Those who, by the meaning of non-action, have mere interest in this secret for a moment,

original: tsam gyis gdon mi za bar dam pa gsang ba thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: tsam gyis gdon mi za bar dam pa gsang ba thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: will undoubtedly attain the sublime secret.

original: de'i phyir lang ka'i bdag bo; 'di la gnas par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir lang ka'i bdag bo; 'di la gnas par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, lord of Lanka, abide in this!

original: 'di las mi 'da' bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'di las mi 'da' bar bya'o //
translated: Do not transgress this!

original: de skad ces smras pas lang ka'i bdag po la sogs pa rnams blo gros dam pa'i nges pa rnyed par gyur to //
analyzed: de skad ces smras pas lang ka'i bdag po la sogs pa rnams blo gros dam pa'i nges pa rnyed par gyur to //
translated: By saying this, the lord of Lanka and the others attained the ascertainment of sublime intelligence.

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las /
translated: From The Sūtra of the Great Assembly of the Transcendent Wisdom of All Buddhas,

original: skyes bu dam pa lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi ba'o ////
analyzed: skyes bu dam pa lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi ba'o ////
translated: this is chapter fourteen: The Prediction of the Sublime Being.

original: theg pa chen po nges par 'byung ba'i tshul las gang gis nges pa rnyed pa'i gtam rgyud brjod ba chos kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes rnam par bgros pa ste byung tshul bstan pa gsum pa'o //
analyzed: theg pa chen po nges par 'byung ba'i tshul las gang gis nges pa rnyed pa'i gtam rgyud brjod ba chos kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes rnam par bgros pa ste byung tshul bstan pa gsum pa'o //
translated: This concludes the third part of the first section of the Tantra of the Dialogue with Subahu, the chapter on the knowledge of the seal of the Dharma, which is the story of how Subahu attained certainty.

original: de nas yang lang ka'i bdag pos gsang ba ba'i bdag po la sngon du byung ba'i tshig bcu gnyis pa'i bzhi pa snying po byang chub nyid du nges pa na'ang 'byung zhes lung bstan pa yongs su dri ba dris pa /
analyzed: de nas yang lang ka'i bdag pos gsang ba ba'i bdag po la sngon du byung ba'i tshig bcu gnyis pa'i bzhi pa snying po byang chub nyid du nges pa na'ang 'byung zhes lung bstan pa yongs su dri ba dris pa /
translated: Then again the Lord of Lanka asked the Lord of Secrets, who had been prophesied with the twelfth phrase, “In the heart of enlightenment there is also arising,” to explain the question:

original: kye gsang ba ba'i bdag po /
analyzed: kye gsang ba ba'i bdag po /
translated: “Oh Lord of Secrets,

original: nyid kyis theg pa chen po gsang ba dam pa byung ba'i tshul gtam du brjod pa'i skabs su snying po byang chub nyid du nges ba na'ang 'byung zhes bkod pa de ji lta ba zhig tu nges te byung ba lags /
analyzed: nyid kyis theg pa chen po gsang ba dam pa byung ba'i tshul gtam du brjod pa'i skabs su snying po byang chub nyid du nges ba na'ang 'byung zhes bkod pa de ji lta ba zhig tu nges te byung ba lags /
translated: in the context of your narration of the origin of the sublime secret of the Great Vehicle, you mentioned that in the heart of enlightenment there is also arising. What is the meaning of that?”🔽The Lord of Secrets replied:

original: smras pa / lang ka'i bdag po /
analyzed: smras pa / lang ka'i bdag po /
translated: “Lord of Lanka,

original: gang dam pa dag thams cad nas thams cad du snying po byang chub nyid snang ba'o //
analyzed: gang dam pa dag thams cad nas thams cad du snying po byang chub nyid snang ba'o //
translated: The essence of enlightenment is the appearance of all that is sacred in every way.🔽Then it was asked:

original: smras ba / gsang ba ba'i bdag po /
analyzed: smras ba / gsang ba ba'i bdag po /
translated: O master of the secret teaching,

original: skyes bu dam pa gang dag yongs su nges pa rnyed de @171a *//
analyzed: skyes bu dam pa gang dag yongs su nges pa rnyed de @171a *//
translated: when the sublime beings who have attained certainty

original: snying po byang chub tu gnas pa na thams cad nas thams cad du ji ltar snang /
analyzed: snying po byang chub tu gnas pa na thams cad nas thams cad du ji ltar snang /
translated: dwell in the essence of enlightenment, how is it that they appear in every way?

original: gang snang ba zhig na ni ma byung ma skyes par mi rung ba zhig /
analyzed: gang snang ba zhig na ni ma byung ma skyes par mi rung ba zhig /
